reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 251/16: PRESCRIBED PERSONS AND ENTITIES - SUBSECTIONS 9 (3) AND 17 (2) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED PERSONS AND ENTITIES - SUBSECTIONS 9 (3) AND 17 (2) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Investment Management Corporation of Ontario Act, 2015

content.content: 1. (1) The Ontario Public Service Pension Board is prescribed as a member of the Corporation for the purposes of subsection 9 (3) of the Act until the earlier of, (a)  December 31, 2017; and (b)  the day on which the Board satisfies the criteria set out in subsection 9 (1) of the Act. (2) The Workplace Safety and Insurance Board is prescribed as a member of the Corporation for the purposes of subsection 9 (3) of the Act until the earlier of, (a)  December 31, 2017; and (b)  the day on which the Board satisfies the criteria set out in subsection 9 (1) of the Act.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Ontario Public Service Pension Board is prescribed as a member of the Corporation for the purposes of subsection 9 (3) of the Act until the earlier of,

(a)  December 31, 2017; and

(b)  the day on which the Board satisfies the criteria set out in subsection 9 (1) of the Act.

(2) The Workplace Safety and Insurance Board is prescribed as a member of the Corporation for the purposes of subsection 9 (3) of the Act until the earlier of,

(a)  December 31, 2017; and

(b)  the day on which the Board satisfies the criteria set out in subsection 9 (1) of the Act.

content.content: 2. The following entities are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 17 (2) of the Act, and each entity is entitled to appoint two directors under that paragraph: 1.  Ontario Public Service Pension Board. 2.  Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.
content.raw_html:
2. The following entities are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 17 (2) of the Act, and each entity is entitled to appoint two directors under that paragraph:

1.  Ontario Public Service Pension Board.

2.  Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
